name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 2
tagline: in which a cursed dagger wreaks havoc
shortSummary: The party finishes exploring Torvaine Watch, claims a cursed serpentine dagger, and travels with Oona to Roscombe to report the massacre.
longSummary: Crossing the hoarding of Torvaine Watch, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan fend off stirges, defeat the undead smith Bartoz, and raise the fort's gates. In the commander's quarters they find Marshal Hildo Brask's body, confront the wrathful ghost of Sir Einrik Arpaad, and seize the cursed serpentine dagger before fleeing under a hail of debris. After recovering Brask's body and a treasure chest, they depart with Oona, traveling through the Torvaine Forest until they meet Sir Gareth Howell and his troop sent by Lady Elowen Duval. Reaching Roscombe, they turn over news of the watch's fall and are asked to consult Owen Tavish of the Sibyl about the dagger's destruction.

npcs.name: Oona Stonebridge
npcs.notes: Halfling merchant traveling with the party from Torvaine Watch toward Roscombe.

npcs.name: Bartoz
npcs.notes: Undead smith of Torvaine Watch, defeated in his forge.

npcs.name: Marshal Hildo Brask
npcs.notes: Devout second-in-command of Torvaine Watch, found dead beneath his holy symbol.

npcs.name: Sir Einrik Arpaad
npcs.notes: Commander of the watch, risen as a tormented ghost bound to the cursed dagger.

npcs.name: Sir Gareth Howell
npcs.notes: Knight of Lady Duval who meets the party on the road to investigate the silence from Torvaine Watch.

npcs.name: Lady Elowen Duval
npcs.notes: Castellan of Roscombe who hears the party's report and commissions further counsel about the dagger.

npcs.name: Owen Tavish
npcs.notes: Priest of the Sibyl in Roscombe whom Lady Duval recommends they consult about the serpentine dagger.

npcs.name: Wulfram
npcs.notes: Temple steward who advised Bartoz to contain the dagger; killed during the massacre at Torvaine Watch.
